summary: Protobuf Payload Converter is broken after upgrading protobufjs to 7.5.2 due to a new `_fullyQualifiedObjects` property that conflicts with SDK's custom Protobuf Root patching logic.
userImpact: Feature tests fail when using Protobuf Payload converters after upgrading protobufjs to 7.5.2, though actual SDK integration tests and user-facing samples continue to work.
rootCause: The `_fullyQualifiedObjects` property introduced in protobufjs 7.5.2 conflicts with the SDK's custom Protobuf Root patching logic, causing undefined property access errors during type lookup.
keyQuote: The `_fullyQualifiedObjects` property was introduced in protobufjs yesterday. It seems likely that this upstream change may conflict with our "Patch Protobuf Root" logic.
